HA Menu for MacOS®

A Mac OS Menu Bar app to perform common Home Assistant functions.

View on GitHub

Battery Notes

A Home Assistant integration to add battery notes to a device, with automatic discovery via a growing battery library for devices.
Track both the battery type and also when the battery was replaced.

View on GitHub

Periodic Min/Max

A Home Assistant helper to record the minimum or maximum of a sensor until manually reset via the reset action.
The value is maintained through HA restarts.

View on GitHub

Hive Local Thermostat

Local Hive Thermostat MQTT integration for Home Assistant.

Zigbee2MQTT will expose the native sensors but Hive requires specific message structures to be sent for setting modes and a combination of sensor values to determine the modes, this integration creates controls and sensors that correctly interface with the native Hive values/methods.

View on GitHub

LMS TVH

A plugin for Logitech Media Server to allow playing of live radio streams from TVHeadend.

View on GitHub

LMS Slim Snippets for Visual Studio Code

Snippets for Logitech Media Server dev, provides both perl and html snippets to help with common slim dev tasks.

View on Visual Studio Marketplace
